name: University Redd
description:
University Redd is a short game and commentary on how our actions shape our life experiences. You play as Mac, a new student embarking on their scholarly journey. As you progress through your first day of classes, your environment changes in response to your actions. By re-playing Mac’s first day, you learn about the consequences and weight of your words - and that every conversation is an opportunity to create safe spaces through how we treat others.
